Uses of Interface
org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.IsColor

  • Packages that use IsColor 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation
    Contains all classes to activate the AnnotationPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-annotation.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks
    All callbacks interfaces to be implemented, also to use the scriptable options of CHART.JS.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.colors
    Contains the enumerations of HTML and GWT Material colors, to consume out-of-the-box, and utilities to create and manage own colors and classes to define gradients of patterns for charts.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.colors.tiles
    Contains all classes to build tiles to use in the a canvas patterns or a Charba pattern.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.commons
    Core classes to manage the inter-operations with java script code.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration
    Contains all elements to configure a chart instance (know as chart options at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.data
    Contains all elements to configure the datasets of a chart instance (know as chart data at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels
    Contains all classes to activate the DataLabelsPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-datalabels.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.dom.elements
    Contains a set of DOM elements that Charba is using.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.geo
    Contains all classes to activate the GEO controllers (AKA chartjs-chart-geo.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.gradient
    Contains all classes to activate the GradientPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-gradient.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts
    Contains METER and GAUGE charts implementations (based on controllers), available out-of-the box.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins
    Contains some plugins implementations, available out-of-the box.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.items
    Contains all elements generated by CHART.JS, which are mapping java script objects, to use at runtime in plugins, events or controllers.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.labels
    Contains all classes to use LabelsPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-labels.js) available for CHART.JS.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.options
    Contains all elements to configure charts at global level (know as chart global options).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.sankey
    Contains all classes to activate the Sankey controller (AKA chartjs-chart-sankey.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.treemap
    Contains all classes to activate the TreeMap controller (AKA chartjs-chart-treemap.js ) for CHART.js.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.utils
    Contains some utilities to use in Charba, like HTML annotation builder, and other java script utilities useful for debugging.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast
    Contains all classes to use Toaster utility.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast.enums
    Contains all enumerations to configure the TOAST utility.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.zoom
    Contains all classes to activate the ZoomPlugin.ID plugin (AKA chartjs-plugin-zoom.js ) for CHART.js.

    • Uses of IsColor in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

      Fields in org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation declared as IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static IsColor LabelAnnotation.DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_COLOR
      Default label annotation background color, HtmlColor.TRANSPARENT.
      static IsColor LineLabel.DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_COLOR
      Default line label background color, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8).
      static IsColor LineLabel.DEFAULT_BORDER_COLOR
      Default line label background color, black.
      static IsColor BoxLabel.DEFAULT_COLOR
      Default box label text color, HtmlColor.WHITE.
      static IsColor LabelAnnotation.DEFAULT_COLOR
      Default label text color, HtmlColor.WHITE.
      static IsColor LineLabel.DEFAULT_COLOR
      Default line label text color, HtmlColor.WHITE.
      static IsColor LabelAnnotation.DEFAULT_TEXT_STROKE_COLOR
      Default label annotation text stroke color, HtmlColor.TRANSPARENT.

    • Uses of IsColor in org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks that return IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IsColor AbstractTooltipLabelCallback.onLabelTextColor​(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)  
      default IsColor TooltipLabelCallback.onLabelTextColor​(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns the colors for the text of the label for the tooltip item.
      If returns null, it will be ignored.

    • Uses of IsColor in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors

      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors that implement IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Color
      This class contains information about a color.
      You can requests a specific alpha (starting form source color and cloning it).
      class  GoogleChartColor
      Google Chart colors provided as enumeration of colors.
      class  GwtMaterialColor
      GWT material color constants.
      class  HtmlColor
      All modern browsers support the following 140 color names.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors that return IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default IsColor IsColor.alpha​(double alpha)
      Clones the color applying the alpha value.
      default IsColor IsColor.brighter()
      Creates a new color that is a brighter version of this color.
      default IsColor IsColor.brighter​(double alpha)
      Creates a new color that is a brighter version of this color.
      static IsColor ColorBuilder.build​(int r, int g, int b)
      Creates a color using red, green and blue channels.
      default IsColor IsColor.darker()
      Creates a new Color that is a darker version of this Color.
      This method applies an arbitrary scale factor to each of the three RGB components of this Color to create a darker version of this Color.
      Although brighter and darker are inverse operations, the results of a series of invocations of these two methods might be inconsistent because of rounding errors.
      default IsColor IsColor.darker​(double alpha)
      Creates a new Color that is a darker version of this Color.
      This method applies an arbitrary scale factor to each of the three RGB components of this Color to create a darker version of this Color.
      Although brighter and darker are inverse operations, the results of a series of invocations of these two methods might be inconsistent because of rounding errors.
      IsColor GoogleChartColor.getColor()  
      IsColor GradientColor.getColor()
      Returns the color of the gradient.
      IsColor GwtMaterialColor.getColor()  
      IsColor HtmlColor.getColor()  
      IsColor Gradient.getInterpolatedColorByOffset​(double offset)
      Returns a color using the gradient as source of colors.
      default IsColor IsColor.interpolate​(IsColor endColor, double percentage)
      Returns a color from a specific offset starting from the current one.
      static IsColor ColorBuilder.parse​(String value)
      Returns a color parsing the string value passed as argument.
      It's able to parse HEX, RGB, RGBA and named color representation.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors that return types with arguments of type IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static List<IsColor> ColorBuilder.parse​(List<String> colorsAsString)
      Builds a list of colors starting from a list of strings which represent colors.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors with parameters of type IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.addColorsStartStop​(IsColor start, IsColor stop)
      Sets the start and stop color of gradient, when the gradient will have only 2 colors.
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.addColorStop​(double offset, IsColor color)
      Adds a stopping color with its offset
      static String IsColor.checkAndGetValue​(IsColor value)
      Checks a color value if consistent, returning the RGBA representation, otherwise null.
      static void IsColor.checkIfValid​(IsColor color)
      Checks if the passed color is consistent, that means with a right red, green, blue and alpha values.
      If not consistent, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
      default IsColor IsColor.interpolate​(IsColor endColor, double percentage)
      Returns a color from a specific offset starting from the current one.
      static boolean IsColor.isConsistent​(IsColor color)
      Returns true if the passed color instance is consistent, that means with a right red, green, blue and alpha values and if the RGBA string representation is consistent as well.
      static boolean IsColor.isValid​(IsColor color)
      Returns true if the passed color instance is consistent, that means with a right red, green, blue and alpha values.
      static boolean IsColor.isVisible​(IsColor color)
      Returns true if the passed color instance is not transparent, with alpha greater than 0.
      GradientBuilder GradientBuilder.setColors​(IsColor... colors)
      Sets an array of colors to the gradient.
      Method parameters in org.pepstock.charba.client.colors with type arguments of type IsColor

      Sets the list of colors.

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.dom.elements with parameters of type IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void CanvasGradientItem.addColorStop​(double offset, IsColor color)
      Adds a new stop, defined by an offset and a color, to the gradient.
      If the offset is not between 0 and 1, inclusive, an IllegalArgumentException is raised.
      If the color is null, the default color for line element is used.
      void Context2dItem.setFillColor​(IsColor color)
      Sets the filling styling is used for colors inside shapes.
      void Context2dItem.setStrokeColor​(IsColor color)
      Sets the stroke color is used for the lines around shapes.

      Default value color, rgb(140, 214, 16).

      Default color value, DefaultThreshold.NORMAL.

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.utils with parameters of type IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MultilineTextAnnotationBuilder MultilineTextAnnotationBuilder.setColors​(IsColor... colors)
      Sets the colors to apply to each row of the content.
      If the colors are less than the content row count, the last color is used for the rest of the content.
      Method parameters in org.pepstock.charba.client.utils with type arguments of type IsColor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MultilineTextAnnotationBuilder MultilineTextAnnotationBuilder.setColors​(List<IsColor> colors)
      Sets the colors to apply to each row of the content.
      If the colors are less than the content row count, the last color is used for the rest of the content.
